text: These are some Portuguese football teams. *Academica *Alverca *Amadora *Beira Mar *Belenenses *Benfica *Boavista *Braga *Gil Vicente *Guimaraes *Leiria *Maritimo *Moreirense *Nacional *Pacos Ferreira *FC Porto *Rio Ave *Sporting ==References== *www.PortuGOAL.net The definitive Portuguese football site * Category:Lists of football teams Category:Portugal-related lists
